text: Shivajirao Nilangekar Patil (1 September 1928 - 5 August 2020) was an Indian politician. He was a leader of Indian National Congress Party. He was born in Nilanga, Maharashtra. He was the Chief Minister of Maharashtra between 1985 to 1986. He was also a member of the Maharashtra Legislative Assembly between 1962 to 2014. Nilangekar died on 5 August 2020 from COVID-19 at a hospital in Pune, aged 91. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Maharashtra Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in India
title: Shivajirao Patil Nilangekar
